name: Heavy Water (Mikey Jeanson)
description:
Tired of reading boring old History books? Struggling to enjoy uncovering the greatest stories of our past? Look no further than the solo-developed edutainment game Heavy Water, by Mikey Jeanson. Heavy Water is a historically accurate depiction of one of World War IIs greatest covert operation: Operation Gunnerside, in which Captain Joachim Rønneberg led a group of Norwegian resistance fighters into a Nazi controlled heavy water production site in Rjukan, Norway and took out Hitler’s greatest chance of making an atomic bomb!

This is the first game I've ever made, I really hope you like it!

Checkout Trailer for the "The Heavy Water War", a Drama made by NRK based on the operation that this game is based on ->
